title: Odor in the Court
description: Andrea says her boyfriend Christopher doesn't shower or change his clothes often enough. Christopher says it's his aesthetic, he doesn't smell, and he's happy the way he is! This episode with Jesse Thorn on the Judge's bench!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
